title: A Cute Master’s Cultivation - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Xianxia
tags: Alchemy   Beast Companions   Beasts   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Orphans   Spirit Advisor   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Transmigration   Ugly to Beautiful   Weak to Strong
author: Cai Yang Qu   彩阳葵
description:
Waking up in the body of an ugly and weak 14 y.o girls body in a cultivation world, Yao BeiBei’s only motivation to cultivate is to satisfy her three main obsessions:

1- Becoming a peerless invincible beauty

2- Eating all kinds of delicious food

3- Being served by beautiful men.

Looking at the ice cold beauty opposite her she asked, ” What’s your name?”

“Bei Ziming”

” Do you have a wife at home?”

“No”

“So if you aren’t married and feeding me delicious fish fry, does it mean you’re courting me?”>
